EmailTemplate.name: Custom Benefit Plan is Final Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Custom Benefit Plan is Final Approved - Employer Name: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Plan_Related_to_Account__c}/DBA: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Custom Plan Request {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Name} for {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Plan_Related_to_Account__c}/DBA: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.DBA__c}, {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Employer_Type__c} has received final approval from the BPA Team and is now pending approval from the DMHC.
Thank you.
